verses.name: Numbers 11:8
verses.text: And the people went about, and gathered it, and ground it in mills, or beat it in a mortar, and baked it in pans, and made cakes of it: and the taste of it was as the taste of fresh oil.

verses.name: Numbers 11:9
verses.text: And when the dew fell upon the camp in the night, the manna fell upon it.

verses.name: Numbers 11:10
verses.text: Then Moses heard the people weep throughout their families, every man in the door of his tent: and the anger of the Lord was kindled greatly; Moses also was displeased.
